name: Alicorn Ring
notes:
Notes
Part of the Alicorn Set. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 5 Silver Tokens.
It is a possible reward of the Primal Ordeal Quest, which guarantees one random item from the Primal Set through the Hazard System.

name: Arboreal Ring
notes:
Notes
Part of the Arboreal Set. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 5 Silver Tokens.
It is a possible reward of the Primal Ordeal Quest, which guarantees one random item from the Primal Set through the Hazard System.

name: Arcanomancer Sigil

attributes.Attributes: fire magic level +1, energy magic level +1

notes:
Notes
Part of the Arcanomancer Set. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 5 Silver Tokens.
It is a possible reward of the Primal Ordeal Quest, which guarantees one random item from the Primal Set through the Hazard System.

name: Axe Ring
notes:
Notes
Axe Rings increase the Axe Fighting skill by four points, for 30 minutes.
Obtainable in the Orc Shaman Quest.

name: Blister Ring
notes:
Notes
You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 2 Silver Tokens.

name: Brandon's Wedding Ring
notes:
Notes
Looks the same as a Might Ring.
Temporarily obtained in the Twenty Miles Beneath the Sea Quest.

name: Broken Ring of Ending

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkCreature ProductsRings

notes:
Notes
None.

Can be transformed into a Shimmer Wand by using a Shimmer Swimmer on it. You can also use a String of Mending on it to create a Ring of Ending.

name: Broken Wedding Ring
notes:
Notes
Decoration. An Engraved Wedding Ring breaks when a player divorces their partner.

name: Butterfly Ring
notes:
Notes
Very easily obtained ring with permanent 2 armor and 3% death protection.
Obtained in the Threatened Dreams Quest.

name: Charged Alicorn Ring

attributes.Attributes: distance fighting +3, magic level +1, holy magic level +1
attributes.Resists: fire +4%, earth +4%, energy +4%, ice +4%, holy +4%, death +4%

notes:
Notes
Part of the Alicorn Set. It will discharge after wearing it for 3 hours. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 5 Silver Tokens.

name: Charged Arboreal Ring
notes:
Notes
Part of the Arboreal Set. It will discharge after wearing it for 3 hours. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 5 Silver Tokens.

name: Charged Arcanomancer Sigil

attributes.Attributes: magic level +2, fire magic level +1, energy magic level +1

notes:
Notes
Part of the Arcanomancer Set. It will discharge after wearing it for 3 hours. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 5 Silver Tokens.

name: Charged Spiritthorn Ring

attributes.Attributes: sword fighting +3, club fighting +3, axe fighting +3

notes:
Notes
Part of the Spiritthorn Set. It will discharge after wearing it for 3 hours. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 5 Silver Tokens.

name: Claw of 'The Noxious Spawn'

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkRingsCreature Products

notes:
Notes
It cures your Poisoned state when you click on it while wearing it, you can use it once every 10~ seconds. When you move it to your ring slot, you will receive 200 damage (will be less if wearing equipment), but if you do it while standing in a protection zone you won't take any damage, once you've put it on you don't have to take it off for it to recharge. When it depletes for one day, you might get Poisoned or Cursed. When you get cursed, you'll get the following message: You are cursed by The Noxious Spawn!. If it happens you receive around 15 turns of damage, increasing from 1 until the last damage of 662+ (remove the curse eating a Hydra Tongue Salad or asking for healing in a temple). When it happens, the message about the claw being usable only for levels 100+ disappears and the claw can't be put in ring slot (becomes a decoration object). It recharges in about 24 hours. Note that the 24 hour recovery time counts down only when the item is "active" i.e. it will not count down in your depot unless you stand on the depot tile, nor will it recover in your inventory if you are offline; keeping it in a house is the better option as it will take the least amount of time. You could also carry 2 or more claws and switch when one depletes.
When you wear it, it will say "It tightens around your wrist as you take it on." and also "Ouch! The serpent claw stabbed you."
After getting cursed by a Claw of 'The Noxious Spawn' you will receive the achievement Cursed!.

name: Club Ring
notes:
Notes
Club Rings increase the Club Fighting skill by four points, for 30 minutes.

name: Crystal Ring
notes:
Notes
The Crystal Ring is mostly used for decoration purposes only.It looks the same as Eleonore's Crystal Ring and House Silversun's Signet Ring.
Item obtained in Behemoth Quest.

name: Death Ring
notes:
Notes
Death rings were once one of the oldest items in Tibia. It was replaced in an update by Stealth Rings at the same time the other magical rings were introduced. It reduces your shielding by 10 points and has energy for 7 minutes 30 seconds. Quite valued on the market nowadays since they can be used as quest items and useful in wars because of its death protection. Using a death ring when your shield skill is originally 10, it is reduced down to 0. It's also worth mentioning that even though shield is reduced by 10 levels, your shielding skill won't go up faster. The value of the ring decreased after Christmas Update 2007 because since then it is obtainable from quests. The attributes are only shown when worn.
Two of them are needed for the Dreamer's Challenge Quest.One can be obtained in the Into the Bone Pit Quest.Another can be obtained every year at Lightbearer event.

name: Dwarven Ring
notes:
Notes
The Dwarven Ring prevents drunkenness and has energy for 60 minutes. It is helpful in slaying monsters that make you drunk, such as Assassins, Cyclops Smiths, Cults, Djinns, Dworc Voodoomasters and Wyverns.
Note that the character does not become sober, but the effects of drunkenness are inactive while the ring is worn: your character remains drunk. Thus, taking the ring off after you have killed all drunkenness-causing creatures will still render your character incapacitated.
In addition to the loot from various creatures, they can also be found inside Usable crates that are around Thais, Yalahar and Edron.
Can be acquired by completing the Geomancer Quest, Waterfall Quest, Skull of Ratha Quest and Triangle Tower Quest.

name: Enchanted Blister Ring
notes:
Notes
It will discharge after wearing it for 1 hour. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 2 Silver Tokens.

name: Energy Ring
notes:
Notes
The Energy Ring provides a Magic Shield for 10 minutes. This is also useful for knights, giving them an extra layer of defense. Note: This ring uses your own mana and you do not gain magic level for mana lost this way.
Obtainable through the Draconia Quest and the Demona Ring Quest.

name: Engraved Wedding Ring
notes:
Notes
An engraved Wedding Ring. These are obtained by marrying someone, replacing the Wedding Ring after the ceremony. Each of the newly weds will get a ring, and the only distinguishing feature between them is that the partner's name is always written first in the description of the ring; the player's is written second.
Although you can see this item in the Market, you cannot trade it there because it has a personalised inscription.

name: Family Signet Ring
notes:
Notes
It can be worn as a normal ring.
Temporarily obtained in the Secret Service Quest: AVIN branch. For the TBI equivalent, see Suspicious Signet Ring.

name: Frozen Claw

attributes.Classification: Plants, Animal Products, Food and DrinkCreature ProductsRings

notes:
Notes
It is one of the few creature items that is wearable.

name: Gold Ring
notes:
Notes
The Gold Ring is used mostly for decoration. It is often considered a status symbol due to its difficulty to obtain, similar to the Ring of the Sky.

name: Horn (Ring)
notes:
Notes
Like Death Ring, has an Arm of 1. Unlike Death Ring, however, this ring does not wear out.

name: House Silversun's Signet Ring
notes:
Notes
It looks the same as a Crystal Ring and Eleonore's Crystal Ring.
Item temporarily obtained during Ferumbras' Ascension Quest.

name: Life Ring
notes:
Notes
The ring gives 8 manapoints and 2 hitpoints every 6 seconds on top of your normal regeneration rate for the 20 minutes that it lasts, which results in additional 1600 manapoints and 400 hitpoints in total; 3200 manapoints and 800 hitpoints if the player is inside a Resting Area and double regeneration is unlocked.
See the GP/MP, GP/HP, Cap/MP and Cap/HP efficiency tables for comparisons of the different items that regenerates your mana and hit points.
You can get Life Crystals exchanged for Life Rings by speaking to Chester Kahs. You can also obtain 1 of these rings from the Life Ring Quest, Darashia Dragon Quest and Behemoth Quest. A life ring is used in the Dreamer's Challenge Quest.

name: Lion Ring
notes:
Notes
Item obtained during the Grimvale Quest - An Ancient Feud.

name: Might Ring

attributes.Resists: physical +20%, fire +20%, earth +20%, energy +20%, ice +20%, holy +20%, death +20%

notes:
Notes
The damage reduction is 20%, rounded up to the nearest whole number.
You can obtain one through the Ornamented Shield Quest or as a reward from the Lightbearer event when 10 basins are lit.

name: Power Ring
notes:
Notes
Power Rings increase the Fist Fighting skill by six points, for 30 minutes.One can be obtained in the Power Ring Quest. One can be obtained in the Panpipe Quest. One is required for the Bright Sword Quest.

name: Prismatic Ring
notes:
Notes
It lasts 1 hour.
Can be obtained as reward of the  Bigfoot's Burden Quest in Warzone 3.

name: Ring of Blue Plasma
notes:
Notes
It can be sold for the full price to the NPC even if used, as long as it does not disappear when used completely.

name: Ring of Ending
notes:
Notes
It can be created by using a String of Mending on an equipped Broken Ring of Ending, this process takes 1 and a half  minute (while server messages slowly update you with progress) and if you remove the ring early your broken ring and string of mending will separate again and neither will be destroyed. There is a chance of dying in the process. This chance is exactly the same as the chance of success, so they're both 50%. It's important to know that if you die, you will lose all of your blessings except Twist of Fate as an ordinary PvE death and the String of Mending will also be destroyed.
The ring is a Prime Artefact and can be used to color a Cloth Fragment (Ring).
When trying to create this ring, you will always receive the following messages:
The smooth string of mending coils around your whole arm as if it was to devour it.
The ring feels quite heavy now. Nothing else happens.
The ring feels even heavier. You feel slightly stronger, however.
You feel better, more energetic than ever before. The ring seems to wrap itself tighter around your finger.
The ring now cuts your flesh. However, you feel fast as lightning and strong as a dragon, fires seem to burn within you.
You feel as if you could touch the stars and see beyond even the dimmest of them. The ring hurts you now.
The ring now seems to be as hot as fire while at the same time cold as ice. Put it off or it will seriously hurt you.
Pain is no word for what you feel anymore. If you do not put the ring off it MAY kill you. Chances are 50/50.
Your pain transports you in a different world, you are alone there. Filled with anguish. You may live or it MAY KILL YOU.
You became pain itself. You are mere seconds away from death. If you do not PUT OFF THE RING. You MAY actually DIE.
The last message, however, depends on your fate.
Message upon death: A bright explosion bursts from inside the ring. You die.
Message upon succeeding: The ring closes. It feels cool now. With the ring restored, you have returned.

name: Ring of Green Plasma
notes:
Notes
Increases your Mana and Hitpoints Regeneration for 30 minutes by the rate of 1 HP and 4 MP per 6 seconds, which means it recovers 1200 MP and 300 HP in total. It can be sold for the full price to the NPC even if used, as long as it does not disappear when used completely.

name: Ring of Healing
notes:
Notes
Increases the speed of Hit Points and Mana Points regeneration for 7.5 minutes at a rate of 24 mp and 6 hp per 6 seconds (4 MP/s and 1 HP/s). This makes 1800 mp and 450 hp in this 450 seconds the Ring of Healing lasts.
See the GP/MP, GP/HP, Cap/MP and Cap/HP efficiency tables for comparisons of the different items that regenerates your mana and hit points.
Obtainable through The Desert Dungeon Quest and Fire Axe Quest. One of these can also be obtained if you have lit at least 1 basin during the Lightbearer Event on a winning server and two more can be obtained if you have lit all 10 basins.

name: Ring of Red Plasma

attributes.Attributes: sword fighting +3, club fighting +3, axe fighting +3

notes:
Notes
It can be sold for the full price to the NPC even if used, as long as it does not disappear when used completely.

name: Ring of Secret Thoughts (Charged)
notes:
Notes
It's a Ring of Secret Thoughts charged with memories from the Ambassador of Rathleton.
It's part of the Kilmaresh Quest.

name: Ring of Secret Thoughts
notes:
Notes
Alternate form Ring of Secret Thoughts (Charged)
It's part of the Kilmaresh Quest.

name: Ring of Souls (Depleted)
notes:
Notes
It can be recharged for 2 Silver Tokens by Cledwyn.

name: Ring of Souls
notes:
Notes
When equipped, it looks like this: .
Once depleted, it can be recharged for 2 Silver Tokens by Cledwyn.

name: Ring of Temptation
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Ring of Wishes
notes:
Notes
It can be seen under the Serpentine Tower and in the Pythius The Rotten's treasure room.
It looks the same as a Ring of the Sky. Its data can be found on the Market.

name: Ring of the Sky
notes:
Notes
The Ring of the Sky is often used for decoration.
Looks the same as the Ring of Wishes.

1 is needed for an addon of the Wizard Outfits.

name: Shapeshifter Ring
notes:
Notes
When equipping this ring, it will turn you into one of the event monsters (Carniphila, Quara Hydromancer, Lost Soul, Blightwalker, Mutated Rat, Zombie, Nightstalker and Pharaoh). Its effects will last for another 60 minutes after being taken off. The ring last for 600 minutes (i.e. 10 hours). This ring will only work if your world succeeded in the Last Creep Standing world task.
Reward from Last Creep Standing.

name: Spiritthorn Ring
notes:
Notes
Part of the Spiritthorn Set. You can recharge it at Cledwyn for 5 Silver Tokens.
It is a possible reward of the Primal Ordeal Quest, which guarantees one random item from the Primal Set through the Hazard System.

name: Star Ring
notes:
Notes
As it's only wearable by players without a vocation, it's only useful on Rookgaard. It lasts for 10 minutes.
Obtained in The Rookie Guard Quest

name: Stealth Ring
notes:
Notes
Stealth Rings make you invisible for 10 minutes. This item is of course great for hunting creatures that are not immune to invisibility (such as Hunters, Fire Devils, Dwarf Guards, Demon Skeletons and Orc Berserkers) and for sneaking into places with large amounts of monsters that are not immune to invisibility, such as during the Medusa Shield Quest. On Hardcore PvP, Retro Open PvP or Retro Hardcore PvP game worlds, the spell Cancel Invisibility has a chance to destroy worn stealth rings. Be mindful of the time left on your ring, as your invisibility might run out while you are in midst of a swarm of monsters.
Obtainable in the Stealth Ring Quest, the Demona Ring Quest, The Queen of the Banshees Quest, the Parchment Room Quest and through the Lightbearer event.

name: Suspicious Signet Ring
notes:
Notes
Can be worn as a normal ring.
Temporarily obtained in the Secret Service Quest: TBI branch. For the AVIN equivalent, see Family Signet Ring.

name: Sweetheart Ring
notes:
Notes
It's an item to celebrate Valentine's Day. When using an equipped Sweetheart Ring, a heart animation will play on your character.

name: Sword Ring
notes:
Notes
Sword Rings increase the Sword Fighting skill by four points, for 30 minutes.

name: Symbol of Sun and Sea
notes:
Notes
This item can be obtained during the Midnight Pilgrimage mission of the Kilmaresh Quest.

name: Time Ring
notes:
Notes
In the old days before rings had any use Time Rings had the name Speed Ring and were dropped by Giant Spiders.
Nowadays it increases your speed by 30 for 10 minutes.
Check Speed Breakpoints to see when is worth to equip and use this ring.

Obtained from Time Ring Quest, Ornamented Shield Quest, Ring Quest, by doing a task for the Rottin Wood and the Married Men Quest and every year through Lightbearer event.

name: Unstable Ring of Ending
notes:
Notes
Obtained when using a String of Mending on a Broken Ring of Ending. When wielded, it will begin transformation, the result of which will either be a Ring of Ending, or the character's death.

name: Vampire's Signet Ring
notes:
Notes
None.

name: Wedding Ring
notes:
Notes
Used for in-game player weddings.
It can be obtained from the Wedding Ring Quest and the Longsword Quest. It can also be gotten from an Unrealized Dream.
